attributes.action: The UK should NOT bomb Syria.
attributes.additional_details:
If we go ahead and bomb Syria, the following will happen:
1. We will give further rise to extremism, which always has an consequence within the UK;
2. There are going to be more Syrians that will be killed.
3. What have we leant from Libya, Iraq and Afghanistan?
attributes.background: Bombing will NOT solve the problem, it will only make it worse!
